note.p: Photographer and engineer. Worked as a photographer in Brighton before emigrating to Australia in 1852. Worked for the district engineer in Hokitika, New Zealand, in the 1860s.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1644/127/26)
England & Wales christening records, 1530–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 November 2012)
Victoria, Australia, assisted and unassisted passenger lists, 1839–1923 (accessed on Ancestry.com, 5 November 2012).
